show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Leave the Herd! Free Your Mind! <!--more--> It’s “Free Your Mind Friday” on Leid Stories—a totally unscripted program centered around and driven by listeners’ opinions and ideas.
They put their own finishing touches on topics featured on Leid Stories this week, or introduce new issues worthy of consideration and debate.
It’s the best open forum in radio!
Contribute to the dialogue.
Leave the herd and bring your best to the gathering place for the exchange of information, opinions and ideas.
Call 888-874-4888 and test your intellectual mettle.
